About.Head: MORE ABOUT ME ©
About.Text1: I am Ali Ismayil, a Frontend Developer and IT Project Manager, building modern web projects.
About.Text2: I’ve been working as a Project Manager and Frontend Developer for 1+ year, combining technical understanding with strong communication and coordination skills. I’ve helped deliver 20+ websites in different industries — from corporate sites to digital menus and brand landing pages. My focus is always clear requirements, correct prioritization, and creating real business value — not just good-looking interfaces.

Connect.Head: LET'S WORK TOGETHER
Connect.Text: Hi, I’m Ali — a Project Manager and Frontend Developer focused on clarity, measurable outcomes, and web products that feel effortless to use.

Contact.Head: Get in Touch
